name: The Book of Darkness
description:
The Book of Darkness is a 2D side scrolling, pixel art horror game (for WebGL and PC) where you play as a young child lost in a nightmare realm trying to get back to your parents, with Monsters unseen to the waking world roaming The Darkness that threaten your very existence. The Book lets you jump between dimensions to see the true nature of The Darkness, but seeing the truth will take a toll on your mind.

If you'd like to play the game in browser, you can check out the creators' game page here: https://starnub.itch.io/book-of-darkness.
